Create a birdhouse using bread slices and glue.
Make a bird feeder out of a bread loaf by cutting a hole in the middle and filling it with birdseed.
Use bread as a planting pot by cutting a hole in the middle and filling it with soil and a small plant.
Make a bread by painting a picture or message on a slice of bread and framing it.
Use bread as a natural insecticide by soaking it in water and adding vinegar and cayenne pepper.
